articles.content: Throughout its marketing campaign Forza Motorsport has been described as being built from the ground up, but some players are skeptical after discovering a reused car model that first appeared in For… [+2862 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Gigantic CME headed for the Earth, can spark solar storm soon; NASA records the explosion - HT Tech
articles.description: A solar storm is expected to strike the Earth on October 7 after a huge CME cloud was seen moving towards our planet. A NASA SDO video shows the moment when the CME was released.
articles.content: Yesterday, it was reported that October could see the same amount of solar activity as the previous month. Currently, there are eight different active sunspot regions on the Earth-facing side of the … [+1871 chars]
